name: Say No More
description: Recreation of the After Dark screensaver 'Say What?'
author: Max le Fou

options.name: quotes
options.description: You can add your own quotes in a simple txt file, putting it in the screensaver folder and put the name here without the '.txt'. The following quotes collections are included: 'saywhat', 'saywhat-fr', 'saymore', 'starwars' and 'mylittlepony'. Default is 'saywhat'.

options.name: secs
options.description: How many seconds between quotes. Min. is 10 seconds, Max is 100 seconds. Default is 10.

options.name: borderColor
options.description: Choices are: 'original', 'random' or any html color code. Default is 'original'.

options.name: fontStyle
options.description: Name of the used webfont. Check the screensaver's wiki to install your own font. Default is 'serif'.

options.name: fontSize
options.description: Size of the font in em. Default is 1.5.
